tool.name: ScriptManager: Convert BED Chr Names
tool.command:
ln -s "$input" "temp_input.bed" &&
java -jar $__tool_directory__/ScriptManager-v0.14.jar file-utilities convert-bed-genome
#if str($output_file_name.bool) == "Yes" : -o "$output_file_name.file_name" #end if
#if str($alphabet) == "roman_to_arabic" : -a #end if
#if str($chrmt) == "Yes" : -m #end if
"temp_input.bed"

param.name: alphabet
param.label: Select arabic to roman or roman to arabic

param.name: chrmt
param.label: Use chrmt instead of default chrM

tool.help: **What it does** Convert a BED coordinate files between the standard SGD roman numeral chromosome names to the legacy SacCer3_cegr arabic numeral chromosome names.
